name: Derek Gaines
bio:
Derek Gaines was born in California, but found his comedy chops while growing up in Philadelphia. He currently calls New York City his home, where he regularly performs and brings a unique perspective to growing up African American in the suburbs.

Derek's first break came when he reached the semi finals of Bill Bellamy's "Who's Got Jokes" in 2010. Also in 2010, Derek was a finalist in Philadelphia's Funniest Person Competition. Derek made his standup comedy television debut in 2014 when he appeared on AXS TV's "Gotham Comedy Live," and was selected by the Just For Laughs Festival as part of their New Faces. He is a contributor to VH1’s "Morning Buzz," starred in Morgan Spurlock’s docu-series “Connected," and is currently the co-host of MTV’s "Broke Ass Game Show."
